content.detailedDescription: Watching fireworks over northwest boise. large orange orb emanating brighter orange was spotted by me. at least 4 other people saw it. at first i thought it was a chinese lantern but  realized it was moving about 100 mph or the speed of a small plane.  when it was almost directly overhead light faded but  round object was still visible against sky and moving at same speed.  i lost it against the nearly full moon but others tracked it another 30 seconds. finally we all had lost sight of it.  it was visible for 1 minute glowing then not illuminated for 1 minute approximately.
content.summary: Glowing orange orb with flamelike bright orange emanatinions. when overhead fade but object still visible

content.detailedDescription: Traveling back home from a firework show about 10pm. my mother and i was driving south towards home. all the sudden i glance at some fireworks in the distance to the southeast and notice something that remind me of meteor shower going in straight path towards eastward direction. i was driving and was turning to go west but stop and turn back east to really get a good look at what i seen.Curiosity got the best of me and told my mother if she saw what i was seeing. she told me yes like stars shining in a cluster. the objects seem to stop going in a straight line in the sky and seem like they hover in a cluster.I pull off to the side of the road and call my sister to see if can she it from her view which was couple miles away where i was at but she didn't see anything but fireworks and i told her call someone else that was living near by where i was at. as i kept watching these glittery objects hovering, now which seem for long time. the cluster star like glittery objects began to drift in a cluster towards north east. i couldn't get anything on my camera phone. i  watch it slowly go into the distance. my sister text me and the person she called seen them over head as well but couldn't take a good picture. it was many objects in the sky that i could not figure out what it could be. i seen many thing sin the sky but this left me truly amazed
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Like glitter meteor shower of objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in the backyard, taking the dogs out. it was a mostly cloudy night with pockets of black sky showing through. the lights from the racetrack across the street (stadium/sports field lighting) lit the low cloud cover well enough that the reflected light made it fairly bright for it being 8:30pm on a winter night. i was admiring a very bright star, over the east horizon line from my vantage point and something out of the corner of my eye caught my attention. a large, low and slow-traveling, black triangular craft with 3 red lights (one on each point) silently traveled directly over my head from over the house and slowly banked slightly right as it traveled over the tree line, about 100 yards away. i could easily make out it's distinct equilateral triangular shape against the lit-up cloud cover. i can't be totally sure of the size but it was very large...Probably close to the size of a large commercial jet. the whole duration of that sighting was about 4 or 5 seconds. i was so awe-struck that i couldn't close my mouth or move for a few moments. the sight of this craft was one thing, but the size and complete silence is what was so astonishing to me. the speed that it was traveling also seemed to me like it would be impossible for any know aircraft to create enough lift for such a large craft. it was traveling so low that i probably could have hit it with a bb or pellet gun...500ft altitude or so.

this first sighting was followed by 2 smaller pill-shaped crafts (maybe about the size of a private jet). these sightings were less dramatic, but both just as intriguing as the large triangular craft. both were black in color with one light on each end and again, both were completely silent and at roughly the same altitude as the large triangular craft, but at roughly double the speed. 

the first pill-shaped craft was traveling in the same direction, but about 100-200 yards to the east of the triangular craft, about a minute after the first sighting. this first one had unwavering yellowish-white lights that were perpendicular to the flightpath (like the wingtip lights of a plane).

the second pill-shaped was traveling more in a northeast direction, except, this craft's lights were unwavering white lights and were parallel to the light of the first pill-shaped craft (the lights were lined up on a west/east axis) while traveling from the southwest to the northeast, passing directly over my head. this one occurred as i was on the phone with a friend at 8:53pm. 

i stayed outside for a while longer, trying to comprehend what i saw, on the phone with my friend while numerous (maybe 4-5) other single white light crafts shot around in the distance over the next hour or so. i've never experienced anything like this and thought that i would have seen something on the news but there doesn't seem to be any other account of this sighting...
content.summary: Large, black triangular craft silently traveled over my head followed by 2 pill-shaped crafts.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i were staying at a house on a cliff on red rock loop road, with a beautiful view of cathedral rock from the bedroom. we had been eagerly awaiting the house's exterior footlights to turn off on their automated timer so we could more clearly view the stars at night.  the exterior houselights automatically turned off at approximately 11 pm. i called my fiancee into the room to see the stars, when i peered carefully at cathedral rock's silhouette in the darkness.
"come look at this. am i crazy, or is there a star in cathedral rock?!" i asked. the bright star-like light was definitely below the silhouette of the rock formation.  he saw it too.  we both strained our eyes to decipher it from this distance - possibly a mile away, possibly less. as i peered closer, i realized there were in fact three lights stacked vertically, and extremely close together.
as my eyes adjusted to the dark, i took in the view of the land between us and cathedral rock.  earlier in our stay, we had been informed that the land down below our guest property belonged to an eccentric organization of people who believe they can communicate with aliens.  we laughed that off as just the type of quirky personalities who flock to sedona.  because of this info, we did notice when a few white pick-up trucks were visible pulling through the property below during daylight hours.  people appeared to be doing work on the property. we chuckled mockingly, "i guess the 'alien-cult' people are working on something down there."
now, in the darkness, i could see that the areas of land where the trucks had been working by day, had a series of lights on the ground, evenly spaced throughout the property. from this distance it looked as though the "alien-cult" had created a system of beacons on the ground.
from our angle, the star in cathedral rock appeared to be hovering, centered among their beacons. 
my fiancee pointed out that the lights now seemed to be two. distance was difficult to judge in the dark, but the uppermost light appeared to be hovering, wobbling back and forth high above the ground. it cast a soft bluish glow downward in a spray, toward the lower light.  the lower light, which seemed much closer to the ground, matched its movement, shifting back and forth in concert with the upper.
this went on for hours.  we strained our eyes to decipher what we were observing. at times he thought the upper light seemed to be moving closer to us.  i had difficulty perceiving that distance change. "it almost moves like a drone," we would say. "but no drone stays up for hours." anytime the spray or glow would shift up or down, i questioned my eyes, and asked if we were looking at the glow of headlights.  at one point, an actual set of white headlights and red taillights moved across the grounds of the property, toward the lower bluish star. we thought for sure a white pick up truck was approaching the light to interact with it. the star did appear to move in response to the approaching vehicle, but then we saw the truck speed away. this interaction made it more clear by comparison that the bluish light was not headlights.
as the hours passed, we wondered if the two hovering lights were a probe, and if the emitted glow was scanning the ground.  we sat in bed watching the strange lights until sleep overcame us.  we awoke in the morning to no sign of what we had seen the night before.
content.summary: A star appeared in cathedral rock, followed by 2 more closer to the ground, hovering in concert. the uppermost cast a spray of light downward.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from walking my dog and noticed a couple of bright orange lights flying low and very slow then a couple of more appeared. then 3 of the 4 of them stoped and hoverd and formed a triangle shape and then up to 6 or more appeared from the north. i asked a random stranger to look at what i'm looking and at that moment the 4 that first appeared got in line formation and started to slowly make their way high into the sky where their light just faded away. i ran home and went straight to my balcony and was still able to witness all of the ufos making their way high in the sky. my wife and kids also witness these ufos.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo flying south in very closeand tight formation

content.detailedDescription: Watching fireworks looking west toward mountains. stationery orange glowing ball of light looked like it was moving slowly toward us in the east.There were no fireworks directly in the vicinity. as we watched it maintained it altitude, and brightness, then disappeared.
content.summary: Watching fireworks when we noticed an orange glowing stationery or very slowly moving ball of light. after about two minutes it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching fireworks and then saw 4 hovering orbs about 30-45 seconds after seeing them i was able to get my camera out and record. the orbs stayed in one spot for several
seconds then would cone together as one then separate they formed a y shape, then a line before disappearing one at a time. they were not fireworks as they stayed in the sky for at least 2 minutes. my video is 1:49 and it was at least 30-45 seconds if not longer before i realized what was happening and grabbed my phone to record.
content.summary: 4 orbs in sky over denver

content.detailedDescription: Stationary light in sky....Blinked red changed to green
content.summary: Stationary light in sky....Blinked red changed to green

content.detailedDescription:
Out for a late night walk. after midnight, trying to avoid issues with 4th of july revelers. walking down an alley, when i suddenly felt like i should look up in the air, behind me.
object was reddish-orange, and not at all bright; the light from it was a dull glow (like the head of a match immediately after blowing it out). it's speed and intensity did not seem to vary. in this, it was similar to the iss in speed, constancy and straight path; unlike the iss, it was too large, and low, and featured the orange-red color i've never seen in conjunction with that man-made object.
displayed no other lights, and no other colors. no sound.
it was travelling from east to west over south ravenna (relative to me, as i was within one block of the center of town) it was traveling basically into the breeze, which was light.
the fireworks had ceased at least a half hour prior to this apparition, and there were extremely few cars or people about, and, no aircraft at all within my vision or hearing.
it disappeared into the west (behind trees), and that was the end of it.
without a frame of reference, it is difficult to tell it's altitude, but at a guess, it was higher than 500 feet, but not more than 1,500.
content.summary: Soundless. match-head just blown out. no aircraft running lights. overflight of downtown ravenna straight line steady speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to 3rd ave from coleman st and noticed what appeared to be a fire in the sky. i assumed being the 4th of july this was firework related so myself and my friend just kind of stood and watched but the spark never went out and it began to slowly rise and then travel left. then very slowly another identical sphere rose from the treeline. it took the same flight pattern and they suddenly dissipated. then two more appeared moments later and had similar patterns.

we continued walking to 3rd ave while this is going on. i take a pic and a snapchat videos of the event. we get to the house at 3rd ave and continue watching them float and fly until roughly 11pm perhaps sooner.
content.summary: 4 glowing spheres traveled along the treeline creating paths and hovering

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were viewing fireworks over the denver metro area as i have done for over 40 years at this location. my wife and i saw 4 teardrop objects moving in what appeared to be an oval. the objects looked to be far to the east of denver thus 20 to 30 miles away. they appeared one by one until all 4 were visible. they seamed to turn and move in an oval path. at times one or two of them would disappear and then reappear. they were far above any of the fireworks we saw and did not appear to behave like any fireworks i have ever seen. that is why they caught my attention. i have view many aircraft at this location for over 40 years. they stayed at about the same level in the sky as they moved. after a couple of minutes they disappeared one at a time. i could not see any sign of smoke or exhaust near the objects. the four seemed to move in a loose formation as they went in an oval. i was looking east northeast from green mountain across denver. we are at 6000 feet so we can see across denver to slightly beyond dia airport. the objects looked to be somewhere between downtown denver and the horizon. these objects were much bigger than any aircraft that i have seen in that directions. airplanes and helicopter lights are much small than these objects. compared to aircraft that i have seen at that distance the objects moved faster. i wrote up my notes on the event right after the objects disappeared. the event ended so quickly i did not have a change to view it with binoculars or take a telephoto picture.
content.summary: 4 teardrop objects moving in a circle

content.detailedDescription:
(315) 854-3739
i got an intrest in ufos a couple months ago when i saw a large blinking light in the sky just to ask see it dissapear a few moments later, after that i got very interested in researching this topic. i started thinking what i could do to try and prove this is a real phenomenon. after researching dr steven greer and all his knowlage on this subject i also started mediating daily. after i learned about the ce-5 protocols, i practiced them nightly after meditating with no results. on june 21 i started a deep meditation at 11pm, while still meditating i began the ce-5 protocols, after i just got done doing it twice, i got disturbed out of deep meditation by a loud high pitched ringing noise in my head. like i always do after meditating i was looking outside my windows, after not seeing anything for a few seconds i had a really big urge to take a picture of the sky. at first i didn't notice anything as i forgot my flash was on, i took 2 pictures after another with the flash on by accedent, and a couple more with out, after i went back to look at the photos i took, the very first one i took with the flash, there was a symmetrical, 3 dimensional machine looking object right behind the flash. i had no doubt when i first looked at it that it was a ufo, i felt like i finally have proof and that i know they where real and peaceful. after i calmed myself down a little bit i kinda felt scared and having second thoughts about what it was. i will be happy to answer any questions and will be open to any outside help



file 1: original first picture 
file 2: picture taken in the same spot right after i noticed what i captured
file 3: picture in same spot with out flash
the specs of light are from my camera flash, i'm using an iphone 5s
content.summary: After i got done meditating, i took a picture that i can't explain

content.detailedDescription: Attending a fourth of july barbeque at my family and enjoying the local fireworks. my family call my attention to a orange orb in the sky around 9pm in the ozone park, howard beach neighborhood.  it wasn't a helicopter nor a plane. it was an orange orb similar to one i had observed several years before in costa rica.  it proceeded at a slow steady pace north east from jfk.  by the way we were about two miles from jfk.  planes look really large when they come in to land.  there were several times we saw the orange orbs.  then we were surprised to see a cluster of about six to eight of the orange orbs.  similar to what i have seen on videos from mexico.  i took videos from my phone but my hand was not steady and it makes the orbs look like they are jumping and zig-zag when in fact they weren't. however, they are moments when i had it steady.  you can hear my family in the background debating what it is.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several sightings minutes apart 1, 2,6, 1 orange orb(s)

content.detailedDescription: I have been a sky watcher (day and night) all my life so consequently i was engaged in that activity one late afternoon on or about march 28, 2016.  the atmosphere was crystal clear with intense blue skies.  i was facing due north and, turning slightly to my left, i noticed a four engine bomber, emitting condensation trails, flying an east to west heading.  when the plane was somewhat overhead i noticed a cylinder flying from the e.N.E. to the s.S.W. and when the bomber was directly overhead it passed under the cylinder such that they visually formed an "x".  it's hard to estimate the vertical distance between plane and cylinder, but if i were the bomber pilot i'd be very worried especially if the cylinder were to appear on radar, and how could it not?  from my vantage, the cylinder was about the length of the plane but about four times the diameter of the other craft.  after transiting the cylinder, the plane continued west and the cylinder was lost in the sun's glare in the s.S.W.
content.summary: Bomber transits cylinder.  cylinder was approximately 100 ft. above bomber.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on 64th street at cactus and i noticed what appeared to be fireworks in the distance at about 1:00 due north. i thought it was the princess hotel's firework display so i kept heading north. it didn't occur to me that the princess hotel was not directly in front of me but off to the right at about 2:00. i watched as this ball "firework" hovered in the air as a solid, pill-shaped light. as i got closer to it, crossing thunderbird rd about a minute later, i noticed that it was dripping what appeared to be molten metal. it was falling off the object at a large rate. i kept driving to see if i could get under it. i called a friend in the area twice to see if he saw it but he didn't answer.
i tried to pull over and get a picture but the objects were not bright enough through my windshield and headlights. 
i thought it was a drone with a sparkler, but i couldn't get close enough. whatever it was, it was too bright to be seen over 2 miles away. as i got through the thunderbird light, the princess firework show came into view through the trees, they were on the horizon at 2:30. the "drone" light tfizzled out and immediately, a second one lit up about 5 degrees below the first. this time, the molten area was facing to the west. then the first one came on again and a third one lit up below the second. the molten parts were facing west/ease/west and dropping down about 5x the distance of the height of the objects. i approached a safeway on greenway and 64th street and all three went out at the same time.
if there are fireworks that hover high in the sky, i would love to know where to buy them. we can't have aerial fireworks in az. i wanted to report it while it was still fresh in my mind and details wouldn't be lost. i am available to answer questions anytime.
content.summary: 3 objects hovering while dropping metallic sparks. they'd move then drip before fading out.

content.detailedDescription: Observed a bright red object moving east to west..At first i thought it was a plane being i am close to an airport. as i watched there were no flashing lights like you would see on a plane just a bright red light. after i noticed several 90 degree  directional changes i called my wife and son out , i did this because 5 yrs  ago i saw something in the early morning hours and people thought i was crazy !  my wife and son came out they both witnessed the bright red light making a 90° directional changes at a high altitude and moving  at a high rate of speed .  shortly after they came out it disappeared i stayed outside and watched approximately 10 minutes later it reappeared in the same space doing the same thing i have a video which is not very good  but i tried to grab my phone being that i should've done it in the first place
content.summary: Bright red light moving east to west. changed direction at 90 degree agile.. also 180 observed by 3 people not a plane or fireworks! vanished and returned to the same area 10 min later

content.detailedDescription: this object was a super bright red light with a white flash stationary for five minutes as of when i saw it looked extremely high in the sky  like the height of a plane but it didn't move eventually it did when it did it was perfect quick small movements  approximately three smaller movements followed by one movement when it left two movements to the left one movement away and then gone it flew away and i saw it live.  extremely bright but far away   to other people saw this with me  the first photo i have had the flash on the second dosnt and is more clear
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: as high as a plane  stationary like a helicopter  but moved way too fast  and perfect

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were driving home after the albany firework display when we noticed what looked like a firework except it just floated in the sky with a dull orange coller.  it was odd enough that i wanted to take a picture of it as it had not moved from its position. i originally thought it to be a firework, but they move and drift with the wind and this did not do that.  we drove down the road and turned around but it was gone.
content.summary: Thought to be firework until we noticed that it didn't not fall deteriorate or loose it's glow.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in a screened in patio relaxing, looking for fireworks being shot off by neighbors around 9pm when i noticed something suddenly in the sky. i thought it was a star at first, but realized there were no other stars in the sky and it was a little too big and bright with red and white light. i went inside and came back out with binoculars and saw that it was dark disc or oval shape and across the center it looked like square panels of very bright light with the red and white light moving across it. the object itself did not move at all. i'm home from college and went and got both my parents who observed the same thing as i did. while we were looking at it, it suddenly shot off and vanished. i've seen sattelites, planes, shooting stars, fireworks, but i've never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Appeared suddenly. stationary dark object with bright pulsating red white lights.

content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was there when fireworks were going off

content.detailedDescription:
I was outide my door having  a cigarettethe smy was black and very few stars were out.Then this bright light appeared in the sky it was overwelming at first it was moving then it stoped.I took my phone out of my poket and try to take a video but my phone was full had not enough memory so i tough that is my luck so i took some pictures but only one came out clear.It looked as the obgect shot something out and then more lights came to the left of the object.But the other lights were different the formed a triangle like shape.But the obgect that was ejected was very long and had green light and yellow lights.It is very strange and does not look like any ufo that you see on tv.This was very different and bizare looking
when i zoom thd picture it almost look like a mediore but i dont really know what to mame of it.All i know is this experiance was out of this world and the feeling was extremely overwelming.I did not feel afraid i felf safe in a way.When this happened i was really in my own deep toughts.
my son was asleep and so was my husband when i told my husband the next day at first he was laughing but then i showed him the pic and he was surprised..This is unexplaningbale and i always beleived that we are not alone in this universe.Thiz lasted for about w min then the lights and object vanished. this was way up in the sky.Bi would love to hear back from you and tell me what it is exactely
content.summary: bright light appeared in the sky llooked az if something was ejected then more light showed up

content.detailedDescription: Going down highway 101 calfornia trinidad bout 3 am the sky suddenly illumined like when lightening flashes..And then the sky was black again and there it was hovering over the ocean.We pulled over got off the road exited vehical..It was diamond shaped huge.With portal at center of diamonf and ring of lights flashing rotating round the center...The edge of this craft wavered like when u see heat coming off the road..It made no sound.It ws beautiful..Fascinating..But then i was scared..Cause i knew it wasn't anything like a helicopter or plane..This really happened not just a light in the sky i saw this clearly with my own eyes..I have no reason to lie..Or make things up..I'm not crazy..I'm sharing what happened to me and what i really saw..It hovered for a while then slowly moved from over the ocean to over highway behind hillside...
content.summary: This really happened.I want to go on record

content.detailedDescription: Was flying my drone over country area when a small object appeared center screen of video and flew past the drone to the left side of video. the object covered 1/2 mile in 3 second, so it was moving at an accelerated speed. there is a main overhead power line that runs behind the property. the object was flying parallel to them at approximately the same height. the object was travelling west to north west in an exact straight parallel line consistent with the overhead power lines. the object was only viewed for a few seconds in the video before exiting the view of the drone camera. object appears to move to fast for a bird. seems to me, by the math, the object had to be moving at 300 to 500 mph to cover that distance it accomplished in the video.
content.summary: Drone catches ufo fly by.

content.detailedDescription: On june 20,2017 arond 1pm in cullman alabama i noticed a circle rainbow around the sun so i yelled at my girlfriend and we both began taking picks with our cellphones.And upon looking at the picks a sphere shaped object is clearly seen trveling to and hovering around the sun
content.summary: Sphere like object hovering and changing direction around sun

content.detailedDescription:
july 3, 2017 at 9:39pm.
4th of 4 consecutive sightings, with in approximately 20 minutes. 
(i'm reporting them separately)

i was at a pre-4th of july party. we were at the end of the driveway in a residential neighborhood, in addition to watching fireworks going off, we were watching the sky because we had just seen three unusual  unidentified orbs, two stationary orbs in about the same spot to the west, at the end of the street. and one orb to the south that was moving east to west. 

they all were identical except for size, the moving one was smaller, 

then out of no where, in about the same spot as two previous stationary orbs, another identical large reddish-orange very bright glowing orb just appeared in sky. again, just to the left/south of  where the fireworks were going off. there was no streak of light like would trail behind a firework. it just appeared. it was slightly hazy around the edges, as if the atmosphere was being disturbed around it. it hovered for almost 1 minute and 5 seconds. just like the two stationary orbs seen before, the orb was large at first. about the same size as the moon that night, then slowly got smaller until it was invisible.  another odd thing about it, as far as i could tell, base on the position of clouds and smoke in the air from fireworks, it didn't appear to be moving away, it just got smaller until it was gone. i have never seen anything in the sky that i didn't think could be explained, i would love to know more about what i've seen. i also would like to know if anyone else reported seeing it.  there were other people out watching at the same time obviously. there were even neighbors a couple houses down out watching at the same time.  i was to embarrassed to go ask them what they thought about it. 

i apologize for the bad language in the video.
content.summary: 4th of 4 consec. sightings, w/video. while watching fireworks to the west, at end of street, bright reddish-orange glowing orb just appeared next to the fireworks. hovered for 1min. 5 sec. size of moon, then slowly shrank until was invisible.

content.detailedDescription: November 2016... i was heading off deer hunting, i parked my truck along a paved roadway and started towards a logged off area. it was about 1 hour before daylight and i was planning on getting to a tree stand which was located about 400 yards away. as i got to the edge of the logged off area, just off the roadway, i noticed a very bright light similar to a landing light on a commercial plane heading in my direction. as it got closer i noticed there was no noise or flashing navigation lights and stopped to watch. as this brilliantly lit object was over my head at under 1000 feet, i raised my rifle to see through my scope. what i saw was a very brilliantly lit boomerang shaped object with squared wing tips. at no time did i ever see any flashing colored lights as required for aircraft, only the completely brilliantly alive lit boomerang with square wing tips in absolute silence. i stood there in awe unable to comprehend what this craft was. i watched this craft slowly without changing direction or speed continue on its path in an easterly direction.  the only reason i am reporting this is because i recently watched a program on tv were the same craft i witnessed was shown! the one thing that will always stick with me is the light that came from the craft... the only way i can describe it , it appeared brilliant and alive, if that makes any sense!
content.summary: Watched silent bright glowing light approaching, as light got directly overhead i raise my rifle scope onto the object to see a boomerang shaped with squared wing tips, the light was so bright i could not see anything but a bright white glowing surface.

content.detailedDescription:
July 3, 2017 at 9:32pm.
3rd of 4 consecutive sightings, with in approximately 20 minutes of each other. 
(i'm reporting them separately)

i was at a pre-4th of july party. we were at the end of the driveway in a residential neighborhood. in addition to watching fireworks going off, we were watching the sky because we had just seen two unusual unidentified orbs to the left/south of the fireworks at the west end of the street, then from the corner of my eye, i saw what looked like the same identical reddish-orange, very bright glowing orb, only about half the size as it first appeared the other times. like the other times, it looked slightly hazy around the edges, as if the atmosphere was being disturbed around it. this time it was to the south of me and flying at a very fast speed from east to west. i was able to catch most of what i saw on video. it was visible for a little more then 30 seconds this time. until that night, i had never seen anything in the sky that i didn't think could be explained, i would love to know more about what i've seen. i also would like to know if anyone else reported seeing it.  there were other people out watching at the same time obviously. there were even neighbors a couple houses down out watching at the same time.  i was to embarrassed to go ask them what they thought about it. 
i apologize for the bad language caught on the video.
content.summary: 3rd of 4 consec. sightings, w/video. while watching fireworks to the west, at end of street, caught sight from corner my eye, bright reddish-orange glowing orb flying faster then plane would go,  across sky south of me heading west.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were viewing fireworks when my finace pointed out a red light and said is that what i think it is. a few months back we had seen a similar light. i was able to take my phone out as we were taking pictures and start to record the object. my fiance was able to get a clear picture. first the object seamed not to move then it did. then it blinked out then turned green. it did this randomly. it would also move then change directions until it descended and dispersed
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orb changing to green then going on seen next to fireworks

content.detailedDescription:
July 3, 2017 at 9:32pm.
2nd of 4 consecutive sightings, with in approximately 20 minutes. 
(i'm reporting them separately)

i was at a pre-4th of july party. we were at the end of the driveway in a residential neighborhood, in addition to watching fireworks going off, we were watching the sky because we had just seen an unusual  unidentified orb in the same spot. it was to the west, at the end of the street again, what looked like the same identical large reddish-orange very bright glowing orb just appeared in sky out of thin air, just to the left/south of the fireworks. in the same way and location as the previous unidentified orb, there was no trail like would come with a firework. it looked slightly hazy around the edges, as if the atmosphere was being disturbed around it. it hovered for slightly over 2 minutes and 16 seconds. i got most of it on video this time. just like before, the orb was large at first. about the same size as the moon that night, then slowly got smaller until it was invisible.  another odd thing about it, as far as i could tell, base on the position of clouds and smoke in the air from fireworks, it didn't appear to be moving away, it just got smaller just like the first time. i have never seen anything in the sky that i didn't think could be explained, i would love to know more about what i've seen. i also would like to know if anyone else reported seeing it.  there were other people out watching at the same time obviously. there were even neighbors a couple houses down out watching at the same time.  i was to embarrassed to go ask them what they thought about it.
content.summary: 2nd of 4 consec. sightings, w/ photo/video. while watching fireworks to the west, at end of street, bright reddish-orange glowing orb just appeared next to the fireworks. hovered for 2min. 17 sec. size of moon, then slowly shrank until was invisible.

content.detailedDescription: I heading home from houston in an airplane. the captain called over saying that we were 10,000 ft. i looked out the window down at the city and took a picture of it on accident. when i took the photo i noticed these lights in the sky, i pressed my face against the window and saw with my eyes. when i went to lift up my phone to take another picture, it was gone without a trace. it was about 21:30 at night. the cabin was 90% black. in the photo the reflection of the phone faintly overlaid the lights, debunking that they were cabin reflections. it's was to high to be fireworks and to close to be stars and to far and small to even be lights from the cabin. there were 8-9 lights all in a boomerang or triangle pattern. the lights themselves on the picture when i zoom up on them, look to have a window such feature on them, they have a verticle bar the separates them like a household window. i lost sight mid transition from the window to my phone.
content.summary: It hovered and when i went to take a 2nd photo, it was gone.
